item.description:
Boston / Cambridge SEO Internet Marketing Networking Group

We invite local Boston SEO, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Location:

Robbins Library  
Mass Ave  
Arlington, MA

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

Food Sponsor

Brick Marketing

7pm to 7:30: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest  
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?

Guest Speaker 1: SEO Marketing Tool Review

BIO:

Sam Schwartz is a Boston area marketing specialist focusing on SEO, web strategy, social media and marketing automation.  Sam works at Edvisors as a full-time SEO, managing SEO strategy and projects for 20+ educational related websites. Sam's favorite part of SEO is experimenting with tools and data, and using them to tell a story.  Sam also has a deep love for digital photography and she shoots local events.

http://www.linkedin.com/in/sambschwartz

Topic:

Sam will talk about some of her favorite SEO tools, both subscription and free, for tracking data, social signals and content generation ideas based on trending topics.  Will then take questions about tool related problems.

Guest Speaker 2:

Subsidizing Your Search: Video, Social & Customers

With the latest Google+ developments, it’s even more important you are doing as much as you can to get people connecting and talking about your brand. At Grasshopper, we focus a ton on getting our target market to talk about us as a company versus talking about our product. I’d like to cover a few ways we do that.

Speaker Bio:

Casie Gillette @Casieg is currently the Online Marketing Manager at Grasshopper, a virtual phone system, located in Needham, MA.  She’s been in the search industry for over seven years, working with clients big and small, and considers herself lucky to be able to work on the internet…because it’s awesome.

What's going on at Grasshopper?

Follow us @grasshopper & on Facebook

Check out our blog http://grasshopper.com/blog

7:30 - 8:15 Open Internet Marketing Round Table Discussion

Experts will share specific advice in an open discussion. No formal speaker, it will be casual group discussion like when we first started this SEO meetup in a local coffee shop five years ago.

8:15 to 8:45 Open Challenge Questions

Time to get advice to help fellow internet marketers.

8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!

----------------------------------  
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: SEO Meetup Topic: Subsidizing Your Search: Video, Social & Customers
